LECTURES:

- 'Part 1: Basics'

- 09/01:
        T: 'Intro and Internet architecture'
        RB: how-to-read::keshav07.pdf
        S: 
        N: Read <a href="papers/disagree.pdf">how to disagree</a>

- 09/08:
        type: exam
        T: 'Review 1 due on hotCRP (discussion concludes on Fri 09/11)'

- 09/08:
        T: 'Control and data plane separation'
        RB: philosophy::darpa-internet.pdf e2e::e2e.pdf openflow::OF.pdf
        S: 
        N: Watch Scott Shenker's talk on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YHeyuD89n1Y">the future of networking</a> and Jennifer Rexford's talk on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mZMy8e1vCIo">programming software-defined networks</a>

        type: noclass
        T: 'Form project teams'

- 09/15:
        type: exam
        T: 'Project proposals due on Sakai'

- 09/15:
        T: 'Transport: Part 1'
        RB: jacobsonTCP::jacobson-tcp.pdf
        S: 
        N: Watch Van Jacobson's <a href="https://www.computer.org/publications/tech-news/computing-conversations/van-jacobson-getting-nsfnet-off-the-ground">interview on TCP congestion control</a>

- 09/22:
        type: exam
        T: 'Review 2 due on hotCRP (discussion concludes on Fri 09/25)'

- 09/22:
        T: 'Transport: Part 2'
        RB: quic::quic.pdf
        S:
        N: Read <a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2581">RFC 2581</a>

- 09/29:
        type: exam
        T: 'Review 3 due on hotCRP (discussion concludes on Fri 10/01)'

- 09/29:

        RB: mptcp::mptcp.pdf
        S: Read <a href="https://queue.acm.org/detail.cfm?id=1066069">bandwidth is only a part of TCP network performance</a>
